Title: Relates to requiring SUNY and CUNY to inform eligible high school seniors of their college options and inform them of their acceptance to community college
Summary: Requires SUNY and CUNY to inform eligible high school seniors at NY public high schools of their college options and inform them of their acceptance to community college; and to invite them to apply to a state college and provide financial aid information.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring SUNY and CUNY to inform eligible high school seniors of their college options and inform them of their acceptance to community college
